title: Client auto closes
body: When i turn on LOL, it doesn't open. When im looking at task manager processes start, but close after 1-2 seconds. It happened today. Yesterday i was playing normally. I tried reinstalling game by Hextech Repair Tool, but it didnt work. I am trying to do something for couple hours now.

replies.body: Are you still running into this? I think we pushed out a fix for an issue with similar symptoms a few days ago.
I know I am. Reinstalled on two different hard drives and same thing happens.

Im also having th is issue. yesterady i was able to lof on after trying to like 5min over and over again. today absolutely nothing. Repaired. reinstalled. Ran as admin/ Ran straight from file instead of shortcut. Get the first loading screen then insta close
